3.caption_en: A slide titled "Cost Optimization" that explains the pillar's goal to run systems delivering business value at the lowest price point. It lists design principles such as implementing cloud financial management, measuring efficiency, adopting a consumption model, avoiding undifferentiated heavy lifting, and analyzing expenditure.
3.caption_ru: A slide titled "Cost Optimization" that explains the pillar's goal to run systems delivering business value at the lowest price point. It lists design principles such as implementing cloud financial management, measuring efficiency, adopting a consumption model, avoiding undifferentiated heavy lifting, and analyzing expenditure.

5.caption_en:
Cost Optimization — a pillar focused on running systems to deliver business value at the lowest possible price point. A call-to-action at the bottom invites users to download the "Cost Optimization Whitepaper."
